events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The system has categorized the customer's issue as related to a refund request due to incorrect product delivery.
Support agent John Smith has been assigned to handle the refund request for the incorrect item received by the customer.
Hello! I'm John from customer support. I'm sorry to hear you received the wrong item. Let's get this sorted out for you quickly.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received and your order number so I can verify and process your refund?
Sure, here's the photo of the item I got along with the order number ABC12345 as you requested.
Thank you for the information. I have initiated the refund process and you should see the amount back in your account within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for your help! I appreciate the quick response and clear instructions regarding the refund process.
The refund has been processed and the case is now resolved. Please contact us if you need any further assistance.
We are checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and that everything is satisfactory with the resolution provided.
Since we did not hear back from you, we are closing this case. Please reach out if you have any other concerns or issues.
We have sent you a satisfaction survey via email. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
Customer completed the satisfaction survey, indicating they were very happy with the resolution and support received.
The case has been archived automatically following company retention policies after resolution and customer feedback.
